jobDescription: Description/Comment:Duties will include working closely with department CyberGrants system administrators to understand organization data and perform specific activities needed to: " Combine duplicate organization records " Ensure organizations have been validated from the appropriate database listings (e.g. IRS or NCES for schools and school support organizations) " Conduct in-system or online organization data research to update and properly categorize organization records (e.g. local chapters of national organizations) " Assign parent/child affiliation to organization records (e.g. a chapter of a national organizations) " Clean up organization records in any other ways necessary Required Education:BA/BS degree or equivalent experience
